name: Upendra Sharma
paragraph: A passionate and self-driven developer with hands-on experience in building full-stack web applications. I bring project-based expertise in React.js, Tailwind CSS, Flask, and SQLite, with a solid foundation in DSA, data science and version control using Git. Proficient in Python and JavaScript, I thrive on solving real-world problems through clean, scalable code. My experience spans web-scrapping,  portfolio development, machine learning-driven sports analytics, and automation projects, reflecting a strong commitment to continuous learning and impactful execution.
